text: David Howell Petraeus (pronunciation: /pɨˈtreɪ.əs/; born November 7, 1952) was the Director of the Central Intelligence Agency. He was sworn in on September 6, 2011. Prior to his assuming the directorship of the CIA, Petraeus was a four-star general serving over 37 years in the United States Army. On November 9, 2012, Petraeus resigned as CIA director following a marital scandal. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Directors of the Central Intelligence Agency Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:Military people from New York (state)
title: David Petraeus
